summary:
Electrical engineering is a field that focuses on studying and designing electrical equipment and systems. It began as a profession in the 1800s with the invention of the telegraph and telephone. This field has many specializations, like computer engineering, telecommunications, and power engineering. 

Electrical engineers often have degrees in related fields and may work in various industries. They use different tools, from basic ones like voltmeters to advanced software, depending on their specific job. These engineers ensure our world runs smoothly by designing and managing electrical systems.
title: Electrical engineering
